title: I would like to "RUN" downloads rather than "SAVE" every time. Is that possible?
content: When I want to run an executable program I have a problem. Under IE, you have the option to RUN or Save. I have no option to RUN the program and must save it to file. Are my settings wrong or can this be fixed? I do NOT always want to SAVE the program. HELP!
creator: akshay.patil

title: A few months ago, probably after FF update, the "open with" stopped working, only "download" is possible.
content:
A few months ago, probably after FF update, the "open with" stopped working, only download is possible.

Particularly, simple url links fail to "open with" including reading with firefox itself. I can not open PDFs, outer program links. Only a few PDF links are opened at specially crafted websites. Probably those are sites with on-site difined MIME or allowing the PDF contents being precashed.

In all the other cases where the file should be predownloaded with FF downloader, it fails to download. The same file is downloaded easily when choosing "save as"

I guess, the problem may be in "downloader" part only, since other online contents are displayed, i.e. stored in cache withoud problems.
creator: Hale

title: Duck duck go returns PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR
content:
If I type a search term into the address bar, or type duckduckgo.com into the address bar, I get a long delay and then:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to duckduckgo.com. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Other sites (google.com) respond instantly, but who wants that?
creator: mike438

title: Set password for Firefox
content: hi, developer Firefox I would like to thank you for the awesome works you have made in 'Firefox' to me, I have used 'Firefox' for along years ago it's the best browser I've been used at all but I always ask why 'Firefox' don't have an option to prevent the browser from open until the user enters the password I think it's more secure if it will be offered in the new version please take this issue into considering
creator: islmfx
